languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте напомнить, что "Бессердечный" обещан вам как трофей — каждый новый удар по кораблю станет еще и ударом по казне династии".
"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, позвольте напомнить, что "Бессердечный" обещан вам как трофей — каждый новый удар по кораблю станет еще и ударом по казне династии".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debo recordarle que la Desalmada será su botín: los daños que causemos a la nave repercutirán en las arcas de la dinastía».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debo recordarle que la Desalmada será su botín: los daños que causemos a la nave repercutirán en las arcas de la dinastía».

languages.text: “舰长大人，我必须提醒您，法务部已经答应将无心号作为战利品送给您。您对无心号的每次炮击，都会对王朝的国库造成打击。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我必须提醒您，法务部已经答应将无心号作为战利品送给您。您对无心号的每次炮击，都会对王朝的国库造成打击。”

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je vous rappelle que cet appareil est censé vous revenir en guise de trophée... Autrement dit, tout nouveau coup porté contre lui sera aussi un coup porté au trésor de la dynastie. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je vous rappelle que cet appareil est censé vous revenir en guise de trophée... Autrement dit, tout nouveau coup porté contre lui sera aussi un coup porté au trésor de la dynastie. »

languages.text: 「陛下、ハートレスがあなたの戦利品として約束されていることを忘れてはなりません。船への新たな攻撃は、すべて王朝の宝への攻撃でもあるのです」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ハートレスがあなたの戦利品として約束されていることを忘れてはなりません。船への新たな攻撃は、すべて王朝の宝への攻撃でもあるのです」

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Taşkalp'in size ganimet olarak vadedildiğini hatırlatmak zorundayım. Gemiye verilecek herhangi bir hasar, aynı zamanda hanedanlık hazinesine zarar olarak dönecektir."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Taşkalp'in size ganimet olarak vadedildiğini hatırlatmak zorundayım. Gemiye verilecek herhangi bir hasar, aynı zamanda hanedanlık hazinesine zarar olarak dönecektir."

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Euch daran erinnern, dass Euch die Heartless als Beute versprochen wurde ... jeder weitere Schlag gegen das Schiff wäre auch ein Schlag gegen die Finanzen der Dynastie."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must remind you that the Heartless has been promised to you as spoils — every new blow to the ship would also be a blow to the dynasty's treasury."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Euch daran erinnern, dass Euch die Heartless als Beute versprochen wurde ... jeder weitere Schlag gegen das Schiff wäre auch ein Schlag gegen die Finanzen der Dynastie."
